A multi-user app that ensures better governance by bridging the gap between people and their elected representatives through a two way communication facility.
The app enable the citizens to suggest the work needed to be done in the constituency and endorse works suggested by others as well.
It also enables the MPs to showcase his/her work and select work from citizen's recommendations based on locally felt needs.
Enabled with features like RTI and JANTA DARBAR, the app brings the transparency and accountability in the system.
The app has the vision to bring responsiveness among the representatives and establish a system where peopleâ€™s consent holds importance.
